# snapshot()

**Instance Method**

A momentary snapshot of all observers added to the collection thus far, that can be assigned to an observable using `-[NSObject setSharedObservers:]`

## Declaration

```swift
func snapshot() -> NSKeyValueSharedObserversSnapshot
```
title: snapshot()
